org.microbean.helm.maven

Class InstallReleaseMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo
              • org.microbean.helm.maven.InstallReleaseMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="install")
public class InstallReleaseMojo
extends AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo
    Installs a chart and hence creates a release.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstallReleaseMojo

        @Inject
public InstallReleaseMojo(MavenProject project,
                                  MavenSession session)
        Creates a new InstallReleaseMojo.
        Parameters:
        project - the MavenProject in effect; must not be null
        session - the MavenSession in effect; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either project or session is null

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation installs the chart residing at the indicated URL and thus creates a release.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • createChartLoader

        protected AbstractChartLoader<URL> createChartLoader()
        Creates and returns an AbstractChartLoader capable of loading a Helm chart from a URL.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        This implementation returns a new URLChartLoader.

        Returns:
        a new AbstractChartLoader implementation; never null

      • getChartUrl

        public URL getChartUrl()
        Returns a URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method.

        This method may return null.

        Returns:
        a URL to a Helm chart, or null
        See Also:
        setChartUrl(URL)

      • setChartUrl

        public void setChartUrl(URL chartUrl)
        Sets the URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method.
        Parameters:
        chartUrl - the URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method; may be null

      • isLenient

        public boolean isLenient()
        Returns true if this InstallReleaseMojo is lenient; if true, a missing or unresolvable chartUrl parameter will result in execution being skipped rather than a MojoExecutionException being thrown.
        Returns:
        true if this InstallReleaseMojo is lenient; false otherwise

      • setLenient

        public void setLenient(boolean lenient)
        Sets whether this InstallReleaseMojo is lenient; if true is supplied, a missing or unresolvable chartUrl parameter will result in execution being skipped rather than a MojoExecutionException being thrown.
        Parameters:
        lenient - whether this InstallReleaseMojo is lenient; if true, a missing or unresolvable chartUrl parameter will result in execution being skipped rather than a MojoExecutionException being thrown

      • validateReleaseName

        protected void validateReleaseName(String name)
        Validates the supplied name as a Helm release name.

        This implementation checks to see if the supplied name is non-null, not empty, and matches the value of the ReleaseManager.DNS_SUBDOMAIN_PATTERN field.

        This implementation allows the supplied name to be null or empty.

        Overrides:
        validateReleaseName in class AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        name - the release name to validate; must not be null
